messages.title: The Liberal Democrat plan for Britain
messages.content: Creating more apprenticeships, £400 tax cut for local workers, Build more affordable homes

messages.title: £8 billion extra for the NHS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have committed to invest £8 billion a year more in the NHS to make sure it remains a world class service we can continue to be proud of. The Liberal Democrats are also determined to end mental health discrimination for good, backed up with £500m of extra funding.

messages.title: A record of fighting for jobs, homes & our NHS
messages.content: Simon Hughes has won the fight for the state pension and capped elderly care costs. Fighting for affordable homes. Simon is fighting for more family doctors and against GP closures, free school meals for all Southwark schoolchildren and vital traffice improvements like the Bakerloo Line Extension and the new bridge and park.

messages.title: Simon Hughes: The only choice to beat Labour on 7th May
messages.content: Everyone knows Simon Hughes is the best MP Bermondsey has had. A hardworking campaigner who gets things done. Remember it's a first-past-the-post election. Liberals always come second in this constituency and that hasn't changed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating more apprenticeships, £400 tax cut for local workers
£8 billion extra for the NHS to make sure it remains a world class service. Also determined to end mental health discrimination with £500m of extra funding.
Build more affordable homes. Simon Hughes has led the campaign which saved Guy's Hospital when the Tories tried to shut it.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race! It's Simon Hughes and the minister's Labour candidate. The other parties can't win here.
